conbody.p: "Approved community," “defense articles," “Defense Trade Cooperation (DTC) Treaty”, "export," “Implementing Arrangement," “qualifying defense articles,” "transfer," and "U.S. DoD Treaty-eligible requirements" are defined in contract clause DFARS 252.225-7047 , Exports by Approved Community Members in Performance of the Contract.
